subtask1a.title: Find the custom speak block
subtask1a.subtext: Locate the custom speak block under the 'Speech' section

subtask1b.title: Find the text variable block
subtask1b.subtext: Locate the text variable block under the 'Speech' section

subtask2a.title: Find the changeLED block
subtask2a.subtext: Locate the changeLED block under the 'Misc' section

subtask2b.title: Find the color block
subtask2b.subtext: Locate the custom color block under the 'Color' section and choose any color
